net.openhft.chronicle.decentred.server

Class VanillaGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.decentred.server.VanillaGateway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, AccountManagementRequests, AccountManagementResponses, ConnectionStatusListener, SystemMessageListener, SystemMessages, Verifier, WeeklyEvents, Gateway

    public class VanillaGateway
extends Object
implements Gateway
    This accepts message from the RPCServer and passes them to the appropriate downstream component
